channel.title: I'm having huge server difficulties, help please!
channel.description:
It just started, everything has been fine up until now. Everyone disconnects out of no where, this is the error.
Please help?

item.title: I'm having huge server difficulties, help please!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Im telling you what it is. Java heap space, it means the JVM fucked itself over because of to many threads and connections. Fix the threading (in other words get rid of 1 thread per client, and make it 3 threads total) then fix the player disconnections (actually drop the connection). Theres no need to follow the stack trace.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm having huge server difficulties, help please!

item.title: I'm having huge server difficulties, help please!
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

do what it says… go to client.java and hit ctrl + g and type in 8384… it has an error on that line. and then do the same for playerhandler

Read full topic

item.source: I'm having huge server difficulties, help please!

item.title: I'm having huge server difficulties, help please!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Fix your threading and the player disconections (IE drop the connection). Your JVM is lagging and crashing. Not your computer.
Refer to this for more info on why wL (what your server is based on) sucks: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,300916.0.html
You might want to have your “coder” fix as many of those as he/she can…

Read full topic

item.title: I'm having huge server difficulties, help please!

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

is your computer running slow? because it might just be out of memory to hold everyone. Restart your computer and run less programs. this happens to me when i got more than one cmd running.
